text: Mathay () is a commune in the Doubs department in Bourgogne-Franche-Comt√© in eastern France. == Geography == Mathay is north of Pont-de-Roide. == Population== ==Related pages== * Communes of the Doubs department ==References== ==Other websites== * Mathay on the intercommunal Web site of the department Category:Communes in Doubs
